snippet: The original, fully scored version of John Harbison’s “Great Gatsby,” commissioned by the Met in the 1990s, was revived on Thursday at Tanglewood.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews John Harbison opera The Great Gatsby, based on book by F Scott Fitzgerald, at the Tanglewood Music Festival.
lead_paragraph: The original, fully scored version of John Harbison’s “Great Gatsby,” commissioned by the Met in the 1990s, was revived on Thursday at Tanglewood.

headline.seo: John Harbison’s ‘Great Gatsby’ Opera at Tanglewood
headline.main: The Rich Are Different: They Can Sing
headline.print_headline: The Rich Are Different: They Can Sing
